text: Scottish Open may refer to: *Scottish Open (golf), a golf tournament on the European Tour *Scottish Senior Open, a golf tournament on the European Seniors Tour *Scottish Open (badminton), an open international badminton championships held in Scotland since 1907 *Scottish Open (darts), a professional darts tournament first held in 1983 *Scottish Open (snooker), a professional snooker tournament *Scottish Open (fencing), a fencing competition held in Edinburgh in early January *Scottish Open (speedway), a motorcycle speedway championship
title: Scottish Open
